question.text: Select the option which shows correct matching of animal with its excretory organ and excretory product.

options.text: Animal - Labeo (Rohu); Excretory Organ - Nephridial tubes; Excretory Product - Ammonia
Animal - Salamander; Excretory Organ - Kidneys; Excretory Product - Urea
Animal - Peacock; Excretory Organ - Kidneys; Excretory Product - Urea
Animal - Housefly; Excretory Organ - Renal tubules; Excretory Product - Uric acid

solution.text: In salamander, mesonephric kidney are the excretory organs, and excrete urea. In labeo (rohu), mesonephric kidney are the excretory organs, and excrete ammonia. Peacock have metanephric kidneys, excreting uric acid. In housefly, excretory organ is Malpighian tubules, excreting uric acid.
